none: 東京都愛宕山の算額 (算額題)・Sangaku of Mount Atago, Tokyo (Sangaku problem)

画像の所有者：京都大学理学研究科数学教室 画像二次利用自由（条件付き）: https://rmda.kulib.kyoto-u.ac.jp/reuse・Image owned by Department of Mathematics, Graduate School of Science, Kyoto University Free License with conditions: https://rmda.kulib.kyoto-u.ac.jp/en/reuse
内田秀富門人妻野重供・Uchida Hidetomi's disciple Tsumano Shigetomo

神壁算法[寛政1 (1789)]・藤田権平貞資閲 ; 藤田門彌嘉言編 ; 城崎庄右衛門方弘, 神谷幸吉定令訂・https://rmda.kulib.kyoto-u.ac.jp/item/rb00028608・Reference: Shinpeki Sanpo (1789), written by Fujita  Sadasuke; Edited by Fujita Monya Yoshiko; Revised by Kinosaki Shoemon Masahiro and Kamiya Kokichi; see https://rmda.kulib.kyoto-u.ac.jp/item/rb00028608
